abstract: Hugh McColl Jr., who built Bank of America into the behemoth it is today, apparently feels really good about the bank’s new chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan.
snippet: Hugh McColl Jr., who built Bank of America into the behemoth it is today, apparently feels really good about the bank’s new chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan.
lead_paragraph: Hugh McColl Jr., who built Bank of America into the behemoth it is today, apparently feels really good about the bank’s new chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan.

headline.main: Former BofA Chief Gives Moynihan High Marks

abstract: Steven D. Black, the executive chairman of JPMorgan Chase’s investment bank, was named a vice chairman of the firm on Thursday, as part of a plan to give more responsibility to investment banking head James E. Staley.
snippet: Steven D. Black, the executive chairman of JPMorgan Chase’s investment bank, was named a vice chairman of the firm on Thursday, as part of a plan to give more responsibility to investment banking head James E. Staley.
lead_paragraph: Steven D. Black, the executive chairman of JPMorgan Chase‘s investment bank, was named a vice chairman of the firm on Thursday, as part of a plan to give more responsibility to the investment banking head, James E. Staley.

headline.main: Black Named as JPMorgan Vice Chairman

abstract: BlackRock said Friday that it had hired a former Goldman Sachs banker, Kendrick R. Wilson, to be a vice chairman and help support the firm’s client relations.
snippet: BlackRock said Friday that it had hired a former Goldman Sachs banker, Kendrick R. Wilson, to be a vice chairman and help support the firm’s client relations.
lead_paragraph: BlackRock said Friday that it had hired a former Goldman Sachs banker, Kendrick R. Wilson, to be a vice chairman and help support the firm’s client relations as the firm solidifies its position as one of the world’s largest asset managers. Mr. Wilson’s large Rolodex could help BlackRock’s win new clients as well as help it gain a louder voice in Washington.
